review.name: Ashwaq Bander
review.text: Atlantis is the best interior design firm I‚Äôve ever dealt with. Their creative designs and amazing prices made choosing them the best decision. The team is fantastic ‚Äî I‚Äôm very thankful for the experience and hope to collaborate again.

review.name: Nouf Al-Johaini
review.text: Atlantis exceeded my expectations. Their creative ideas and budget-friendly approach made everything smooth from the start. Engineer Reema, Engineer Ahmed, and Engineer Omnia were very cooperative. I loved the result and definitely plan to work with them again

review.name: Amal Alahmari
review.text: My experience with Atlantis was amazing. Their designs are refined and very affordable. Special thanks to Engineer Reema, Engineer Abdullah, and Ms. Noor for all their efforts. The team‚Äôs professionalism and attention to every detail was clear. I look forward to working with them on future projects

review.name: Nouf Al-Johaini
review.text: From start to finish, working with Atlantis was excellent. Their interior designs are elegant, prices are reasonable, and everything went seamlessly. The final result was beyond my expectations

review.name: Osama Bukhari
review.text: Atlantis delivered on every promise throughout my project. Their attention to detail and well-thought-out solutions made a big difference in my experience. The team was clear in communication, highly professional, and made the whole process smooth and enjoyable

How Much Does A Bathroom Renovation Cost? Your Expert Guide To Making The Most Of Your Budget

content.text: Ever wondered about the bathroom renovation cost and how to get the most value for your money? Our latest guide breaks down the expenses and offers savvy tips to maximize your budget. Let‚Äôs break down the expenses and discover how to budget for your dream space.
It‚Äôs crucial to understand where your money will go. Here are the major expense areas to consider.

items: Designing: The average cost of hiring a professional designer ranges from $50 to $200 per hour. You can also opt for flexible services that offer flat-rate affordable design packages.
Demolition: The cost of bathroom demolition is often overlooked but necessary for any major renovation. It‚Äôs crucial to work with professionals to remove old fixtures and materials safely.

Materials: It‚Äôs wise to shop around and compare prices to find the best deals without compromising on quality. Additionally, consider the longevity and durability of materials to ensure your investment lasts.

virtualtour.mainTitle: Atlantis Real Estate Interactive Sales System
virtualtour.description: Explore Atlantis‚Äô curated portfolio powered by Digital Twin innovations, replacing outdated paper-driven workflows with a seamless digital platform.
virtualtour.bottomText: A Prop-Tech product that can skyrocket your sales and marketing with less effort for your real estate and investment purposes.

steps.title: Get The Project Estimation
steps.description: Share your project details by booking a 30-minute consultation or emailing us with information on project timeline, virtual tour requirements, unit availability, analytics, and budget. We respect your time and will provide an estimate proposal within 72 hours.

steps.title: Monitor Project Development
steps.description: We guide every stage, with a project timeline requiring at least 6 weeks, determined by milestones based on agreed features like interactive tools, 3D visualization, animations, or site development.

steps.title: Successful Project Delivery
steps.description: We ensure your 3D Interactive Virtual Tour project is thoroughly tested for design, features, usage, and quality. By enhancing your project experience, your sales and marketing team stays updated, translating to increased income.

features.description: Redefining real estate with a truly seamless digital experience.

items.title: 3D Web Interactive Sales System
items.description: Explore projects on a customized map with real-time updates, including distances and travel times to nearby landmarks.

items.title: Interactive Interior Walkthrough
items.description: Experience an immersive tour of your client future unit with measurements, design, and layouts.

items.title: Availability And Filtration
items.description: CRM Integration ensures real-time updates, filtering according to your client's preferences.

items.title: Virtual Meeting
items.description: Save time by having an online meeting with your customers as they explore the project.

items.title: Call Back & Buy Now
items.description: Allow clients to book units online and receive instant callbacks for their queries.

items.title: Shareable
items.description: All features are shareable and can be integrated into your website or CRM.

projects.mainTitle: Explore our diverse range of previous projects now

items.question: What design services do you offer?
items.answer: We provide a complete online interior design service: space planning, furniture and paint selection, 3D design, VR simulation, full execution drawings (AutoCAD & PDF), and bill of quantities for accurate implementation.

items.question: How can I start an online interior design project with Atlantis?
items.answer: It‚Äôs simple! Book an online consultation with our designers, choose the package that suits you (Basic, Enhanced, or Premium), and we‚Äôll create a dedicated group for your project to track progress and answer your questions step by step.

items.question: How long does it take to complete an interior design project? Is there a faster option for urgent cases?
items.answer: Typically, the initial design and execution drawings take 5‚Äì10 weeks, depending on the project size and complexity. For urgent cases, we offer an expedited design option without compromising on quality or cost.

items.question: Do you provide realistic 3D designs for spaces?
items.answer: Yes! Both Enhanced and Premium packages include 3D design to give you a clear preview of your space before execution. The Premium package even offers a full 360¬∞ walkthrough for an immersive experience.

items.question: Do you provide realistic 3D designs for spaces?
items.answer: Yes! Both Enhanced and Premium packages include 3D design to give you a clear preview of your space before execution. The Premium package even offers a full 360¬∞ walkthrough for an immersive experience.

items.question: How much does it cost to design a single room with Atlantis? Are prices tax-inclusive?
items.answer: Our packages are priced per square meter:</br>Basic: 18 SAR/m¬≤</br>Enhanced: 33 SAR/m¬≤</br>Premium: 45 SAR/m¬≤Prices are inclusive of VAT. Services vary by package, and we can provide you with a tailored quote after reviewing your project details.

items.question: What‚Äôs the difference between the Basic, Enhanced, and Premium packages?
items.answer: Basic: Space planning & basic element selection, no 3D or detailed execution drawings.</br>Enhanced: Full planning + furniture selection + 3D model (without 360¬∞ view).</br>Premium: Customized design + 3D + 12 execution boards + full 360¬∞ walkthrough + detailed follow-up.

items.question: Are your design services available online for all cities in Saudi Arabia?
items.answer: All our services are online and available across Saudi Arabia and even internationally.

items.question: Do you help with choosing furniture, colors, and materials? Do you provide warranties?
items.answer: Yes. Our designers suggest the right furniture, paints, and materials. Our furniture is crafted from beechwood, high-density foam, and imported fabrics, with a 10-year warranty.

items.question: Can I see my home design before actual execution?
items.answer: Yes, we provide 3D images, VR simulation, and a complete 360¬∞ walkthrough so you can preview every detail before work begins.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.description: Welcome to Hindam! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and website. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application or website.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.description: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect via the application includes:

subsections.title: Personal Data
subsections.text: Personally identifiable information such as your name, address, email, and demographic details that you provide voluntarily when you register or engage with our services.

subsections.title: Derivative Data
subsections.text: Automatically collected information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and viewed pages.

subsections.title: Financial Data
subsections.text: Payment-related information, such as credit card details, that we may collect when you make purchases or transactions.

subsections.title: Mobile Device Data
subsections.text: Information about your mobile device, including ID, model, manufacturer, and location data if accessed via mobile.

sections.heading: Use of Your Information
sections.description: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use the information collected about you via the application to:
list: Create and manage your account.
Process your orders and transactions.
Email you regarding your account or order.
Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, and other transactions related to the application.
Generate a personal profile to make your future visits more personalized.
Increase the efficiency and operation of the application.
Monitor and analyze usage trends to improve your experience.
Notify you of updates to the application.
Offer new products, services, and recommendations.
Perform other business activities as needed.
Prevent fraudulent transactions and protect against criminal activity.

sections.heading: Disclosure of Your Information
sections.description: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:

subsections.title: By Law or to Protect Rights
subsections.text: If required by law or to protect the rights, property, or safety of others, we may share your information as permitted by applicable law or regulation.

subsections.title: Business Transfers
subsections.text: We may share or transfer your information during negotiations of any merger, sale of assets, financing, or acquisition of our business.

subsections.title: Third-Party Service Providers
subsections.text: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us, including payment processing, data analysis, hosting, and customer service.

security.heading: Security of Your Information
security.description: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we take reasonable steps to secure the data you provide, please be aware that no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection against misuse or interception.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

section.title: Build Your World in Atlantis
section.description: Having designed and executed over 100+ homes, we make managing your home projects quick, easy, and convenient in Saudi Arabia.

values.mainTitle: The values we strive to achieve

items.title: Quality Is Essential
items.description: We never compromise on quality. Our reputation depends on delivering excellence, and we are committed to providing a high-quality experience.

items.title: Teamwork And Collaboration
items.description: Our success relies on our collective efforts. We work together to perform at our best and surpass expectations.

items.title: Customer Focus
items.description: We aim to exceed your expectations by delivering timely solutions and adding real value to your project.

items.title: Integrity And Transparency
items.description: We are committed to accountability, ensuring you receive accurate information from our team when you need it.

items.title: Innovation And Expertise
items.description: We hire the best designers to achieve excellence, thinking outside the box to meet your objectives effectively.

services.subtitle: Carefully curated offerings designed to save you time and help you visualize results faster.

items.title: Interior Design
items.description: Access our top designers from around the world without leaving your home. Plans, mood boards, and detailed shopping lists to guide your project from start to finish.

items.title: Exterior Design
items.description: From landscaping to architectural facades, we craft stunning exteriors that instantly lift your surroundings and curb appeal.

items.title: Finishing
items.description: Elevate comfort with features like insulation and soundproofing while enhancing property value through high-quality finishes.

items.title: Furniture Services
items.description: Furniture choices expertly matched with your overall design plan to create a seamless and unified look.

items.title: Landscaping Services
